messages.message:
Hi Team,

One of our customers require version control for their code on Instabase. I understand this feature is in LTS but is it okay to suggest this to the client?
Are we good in supporting any bugs that may occur?

https://instabase.com/docs/24.01/platform-admin/sdlc/index.html

cc: @Aimé @BG @Varun K V @Badri

If there are any alternatives instead of mentioning this feature I would push them towards the alternative. We can support critical bugs, but note we haven’t made a single bug fix/code change for this feature in almost 3 years. It’s unclear whether that means no one is using it, or it works sufficiently well out of the box that there are no bugs (I highly doubt it’s the latter given our track record :smile:).
